borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the side and rear of the existing back addition following the demolition of existing external rear structures, formation of a courtyard between the rear of the main building and proposed single storey rear extension including alterations to the existing openings to include installation of 1no. double glazed uPVC window and 1no. obscure glazed uPVC window to the side elevation following the removal of an existing door and a window, removal and infilling in bricks 2no. existing windows to the side elevation and installation of a new double glazed uPVC window to the rear elevation of first floor back addition, removal and infilling in bricks 1no. existing window to the side elevation and installation of a new double glazed uPVC window to the rear elevation of second floor back addition; replacement of all existing windows with new double glazed timber windows to the front elevation at ground and first floor level; alterations to the front boundary wall to include re-rendering the brick wall and erection of new metal railings on top, erection of rendered brick piers with stone coping, and installation of a metal access gate to both properties (nos. 6 and 8 Niton Street).
